function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex formulas and parameters increase the potential for error in calculations and implementation.","Impact":"Inaccurate calculations and decision-making based on flawed data.","Mitigation":"Use robust validation processes and quality control checks to verify accuracy of formulas and parameters.","Technologies":"Algorithm validation tools, data visualization platforms, and automated error-checking algorithms.","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and data analysts.","Owner":"Data analysis teams and researchers."},{"Description":"Time-varying models and factors introduce additional complexity and potential for error in modeling and estimation.","Impact":"Unreliable predictions and policy recommendations based on inaccurate or incomplete modeling data.","Mitigation":"Implement thorough sensitivity analysis and model validation to assess the impact of time-varying factors on the overall model.","Technologies":"Simulation and modeling software, sensitivity analysis tools, and validation algorithms.","People":"Modelers, statisticians, and policy analysts.","Owner":"Modeling and analysis teams."}]}
